ygData.subject: Re: The madness explained!
ygData.msgSnippet: I can appreciate jokes very much, but with the mentally retarded things Verant has done since day one, there was no reason to believe that this wasnt
ygData.messageBody:
"I can appreciate jokes very much, but with the mentally retarded things
Verant has done since day one, there was no reason to believe that this
wasnt true...think about it."

that's what makes it funny! verant handles some things in such a backward
and amazingly clueless manner that the kind of crap i post is judged as
truth on it's lack of common sense.

sorry if it bothers anyone =)

kg

>From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

>Sarcasm is rarely easy to pick up in text.
>Maybe you should use your little =) thing more often.
>
>Krukhan = loud mouth ass ..but wait... =)
>just kidding
>
>I can appreciate jokes very much, but with the
>mentally retarded things Verant has done since day
>one, there was no reason to believe that this wasnt
>true...think about it.
>
